resources.string:
Important information:

This app allows free use only for two weeks, with limitations on the number of photos.

Please test the app. If you find it useful, then you may purchase a premium pack within the app that allows unlimited use.

First steps:

  1. Take photos of right eye and left eye
  2. Assign a name (and date) to the photos
  3. View and analyze the photos

string-array.name: releasenotes_version_notes
string-array.item: Initial version, based on Eye Diagnosis app, with largely improved camera flow.
Increased trial period to 2 weeks. Enabled various guidance circles on camera. Bugfixes.
Flashlight can be used in camera. Vertical photos are possible. Bugfixes.
Selection of camera focus modes. Base enablement of Android 5 camera features. Bugfixes
Possibility to shift the camera screen via the settings (if buttons are covered by the Miniris ribbon). Bugfixes
